original_text: Ye shall have one law for him that sinneth through ignorance, both for him that is born among the children of Israel, and for the stranger that sojourneth among them.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손 중 본토 소생이든지 그들 중에 거류하는 타국인이든지 누구든 부지중에 범죄한 자에 대한 법이 동일하거니와

sentences.original_text: for him that sinneth through ignorance
both for him that is born among the children of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 자손 중에서 난 자를 위하여도

sentences.original_text: and for the stranger that sojourneth among them
